column5: Quick question for those of you who troll for these guys once in a while what is your fav speed to be at I have been around 3 mph and I am wondering if I am too fast,.  Cheers  Gnoddy
3 MPH too fast... dude... go faster.. way faster! try 5-6.5
3.5mph would be slow...4.5 mph would be typical, many guys troll as fast as 7mph.
3.5 MPH....topwaters!! BIG topwaters! Start at 5 or 6 & slow down a little(gradually) until you find the "groove". It may change by the hour or by day.  FT
what everyone else said.  3 mph is for pickerel
